pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# Qute WindowCross-platform frameless window based on Python and Qt## Examples### Qute Window on macOS

### Qute Window on Windows

## Features* Moving (the title bar area is draggable)* Stretching* Native window shadow* Native window animations* Win11 snap layout## Installing via PIP```shellpip install qutewindow```## UsageHere is a minimal example:```pythonimport sysfrom PySide6.QtWidgets import QApplicationfrom qutewindow import QuteWindowif __name__ == "__main__": app = QApplication(sys.argv) demo = QuteWindow() demo.show() sys.exit(app.exec())```
